titles.title: A resolution designating January 27, 2017, as "Earned Income Tax Credit Awareness Day".
A resolution designating January 27, 2017, as "Earned Income Tax Credit Awareness Day".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Designates January 27, 2017, as Earned Income Tax Credit Awareness Day. Calls on federal, state, and local agencies; community organizations; nonprofit organizations; employers; and other partners to help increase awareness about the earned income tax credit and other refundable tax credits to ensure that all eligible workers have access to the full benefits of the credits.
